mapper.sql: ENT_REPO_ID, ENT_ID, REPO_TYPE, SHIP_ID, REPORT_STATE, REPORT_PERIOD_TYPE, REPORT_PERIOD, REPORT_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATOR, ORG_ID, CREATE_DATE, OPER_DATE, STATE, NOTE, MASTER, STATIS_MASTER, REPO_MASTER, CONTACT_PHONE, ENT_NAME_CHN

select
distinct
from REPO_ENT_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into REPO_ENT_INFO (ENT_REPO_ID, ENT_ID, REPO_TYPE, SHIP_ID, REPORT_STATE, REPORT_PERIOD_TYPE, REPORT_PERIOD, REPORT_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATOR, ORG_ID, CREATE_DATE, OPER_DATE, STATE, NOTE, MASTER, STATIS_MASTER, REPO_MASTER, CONTACT_PHONE, ENT_NAME_CHN ) values (#{entRepoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{entId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportPeriodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{master,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statisMaster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repoMaster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entNameChn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SHIP_ID = #{shipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
